front.title: Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) over Datagram Transport Layer Security (DTLS)

abstract.t: This specification defines how to use Datagram Transport Layer Security (DTLS) as a transport for Session Initiation Protocol (SIP). DTLS is a protocol for providing Transport Layer Security (TLS) security over a datagram protocol. This specification also specifies the IANA registrations for using SIP with Datagram Congestion Control Protocol (DCCP).
